Class Pizza

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.project5.Pizza
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Customizable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BBQChicken, BuildYourOwn, Deluxe, Meatzza
    public abstract class Pizza
extends java.lang.Object
implements Customizable
    This is the abstract class for the pizza flavors.
    Author:
    Ryan S. Lee, Songyuan Zhang
